@graph.name: OpenAI to Optizen AI Connection Tool
@graph.description: Interactive tool for connecting OpenAI services to Optizen AI platform, enabling seamless AI integration and workflow automation.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript support

@graph.name: How to Connect OpenAI to Optizen AI
@graph.description: Complete guide for integrating OpenAI services with Optizen AI platform

step.name: Create OpenAI Account
step.text: Sign up at https://platform.openai.com/ to create your OpenAI platform account

step.name: Access Optizen Integration
step.text: Navigate to the Optizen AI connection tool to begin the integration process

step.name: Configure Connection
step.text: Follow the step-by-step wizard to establish the connection between OpenAI and Optizen AI

mainEntity.name: What do I need to connect OpenAI to Optizen AI?

acceptedAnswer.text: You need an active OpenAI platform account from https://platform.openai.com/ and access to the Optizen AI platform.

mainEntity.name: Is the OpenAI integration free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: The integration tool itself is free, though OpenAI API usage may incur costs based on your OpenAI pricing plan.

mainEntity.name: How long does the connection process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The connection setup typically takes 10-15 minutes following the guided integration process.
